Name: Coding
Description: I look everyday to learn more. I began progmamming in highschool. Starting with java, now comfortable with frontend and backend development. I have also done some embedded development during my career with c++. I graduated in spring of 2019 with my B.S. in Computer Science.

Name: Computer
Description: I have spent a great deal of time learning the inner workings of computer hardware. I have built my own PCs and continue to learn by building my own minature network with multiple raspbery pis and other IoT devices.

Name: Quadcopter
Description: I build quadcopters as a hobby. It is a very addictive hobby being able to fly so fast (at speeds greater than 70 mph) and be so agile. If you have not tried it, I recommend checking out 'FPV Quadcopters' and if you are anything like me you'll be amazed.

Name: 3D Printing
Description: I recently picked up a new hobby of 3D printing that will allow me to make my own parts for Quadcopters and other devices I construct. I also annoy my Wife with high electric bills.
